summary: Fantasy sports league app with position slot management. League is named 'League. Maine'.

existing_features.title: Update the HeroSection stats bar to display '2 slots' (instead of '5 slots') for each position (Forward, Center, Guard).

new_feature_requests.summary: All positions should have two slots open
Update the backend capacity enforcement so that each basketball position (Forward, Center, Guard) has a maximum of 2 slots instead of the current cap of 5.
